results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum (21d) using momentum style loading
results.description: Use recent momentum factor loading to capture cross-sectional momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 (single high-quality field rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum) — limited to one field for simplicity; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field used); SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 1.0); SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing a high userCount field. Kept implementation short and respected KEEP_IN_MIND (<=7 operators, <=2 datafields). Confidence: 0.78 because momentum factor historically robust but mean-reversion risk exists.

results.idea: Market-neutral long-short on short-interest anomaly
results.description: Long low short-interest and short high short-interest cross-section to exploit short-squeeze risk premium. SUGGESTION1: used short_interest_factor_score (high userCount). SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: coverage fine. SUGGESTION4: chosen high alpha/user counts. Complies with KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.65 (short-interest signal has moderate persistence).

results.idea: Hedge-fund crowding reversal: fade high hedge fund ownership percent
results.description: Short highly-held-by-hedge-funds stocks and go long low-ownership expecting reversal from crowding. SUGGESTION1 used hedge_fund_ownership_percent (very high userCount/alphaCount). SUGGESTION2/3 not used. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.72 (crowding reversal signal is informative).

results.idea: Size tilt: favor midcap exposures
results.description: Exploit midcap style loading by going long stocks with higher midcap loading relative to market. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_midcap (good userCount). SUGGESTION4 applied. Other suggestions not applicable. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.6 (size premiums modest).

results.idea: Value vs momentum spread using VALUE and Momentum loadings
results.description: Combine value and momentum style loadings: long high value & positive momentum exposure, short opposite. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two high-quality fields (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value, rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum). SUGGESTION2/3 not needed. Respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence: 0.8 (diversified, classic combo).

results.idea: Residual volatility contrarian: short high residual volatility
results.description: Short names with high residual volatility loading expecting risk premium. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol (high userCount). Others N/A. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.66 (residual vol premium moderate).

results.description: Use recent daily_specific_return time-series zscore to capture idiosyncratic momentum. SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return (high userCount). SUGGESTION3 not needed. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.7 (idiosyncratic momentum shows persistence short-term).

results.description: Exploit dividend-yield style loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild) by going long high dividend exposure normalized cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 applied; others not. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.58 (yield effects modest in equities).

results.description: Dampen momentum exposure by high sentiment (to avoid bubbly names) using subtraction or multiply with reversed sentiment. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.7 (avoids sentiment-driven blowups).

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion via ts_kurtosis on specific returns
results.description: Short names with extreme kurtosis in daily_specific_return (ts_kurtosis) indicating fat tails and likely mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence: 0.58 (statistical measure useful but noisy).

results.idea: Low ownership & rising earnings yield combo
results.description: Long stocks with low hedge-fund ownership and rising earnings yield exposure (ts_delta of earnyild). SUGGESTION1 used hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.69 (uncrowded fundamental improvement attractive).

results.idea: Momentum with specific risk floor: require low srisk to trade
results.description: Take momentum longs only if rsk70_mfm2_usfast_srisk below threshold to ensure low idiosyncratic noise. SUGGESTION1 used both fields and trade_when. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.7 (risk filtering improves performance).

results.idea: Industry mean-reversion flagged by hedge-fund flow
results.description: Short industries where aggregate hedge_fund_ownership_percent for that industry spiked (use industry exposures individually). SUGGESTION1 applied selecting industry exposure and hedge fund field. KEEP_IN_MIND respected (2 fields). Confidence: 0.63 (industry-level flows predictive).

results.idea: Prospect x profit long filter
results.description: Long names with high prospect and profit loadings (multiply) to pick growth with profitability. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. KEEP_IN_MIND ok. Confidence: 0.68 (blend reputable).

results.idea: Short-term trend-following on specret daily
results.description: Follow short-term trends in rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi using ts_zscore(10). SUGGESTION1 used this field (high userCount). KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.66 (short-term industry trends exploitable).

results.idea: Quantile-based value rotation
results.description: Long names in top quantile of rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and short bottom quantile, implemented via quantile operator. SUGGESTION1 used value field. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence: 0.67 (classic value factor).

results.idea: Short high srisk with rising market exposure
results.description: Short stocks where srisk is high and market loading is increasing (risk concentrated in market-exposed names). SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_srisk and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.6 (market-driven risk elevation).

results.idea: Hedge-fund ownership as momentum confirmation
results.description: Only keep momentum signals when hedge_fund_ownership_percent also rising as confirmation. SUGGESTION1 used both fields and trade_when. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence: 0.7 (flow-confirmed momentum stronger).

results.idea: Short interest normalization by market cap and resvol
results.description: Normalize short interest by size and residual volatility to reduce microcap/residual noise. SUGGESTION1 used short_interest_factor_score, current_market_cap_usd, rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol (but limited to 2 fields, so used short interest and market cap only). SUGGESTION4 used high-count fields. KEEP_IN_MIND respected (2 fields). Confidence: 0.64 (normalization improves signal).

results.idea: Value momentum composite: value * momentum
results.description: Multiply value loading and momentum loading to favor cheap names with momentum. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.72 (composite robust).

results.idea: Short high hedge-fund percent & negative prospect
results.description: Short where hedge_fund_ownership_percent is high and prospect loading negative (crowded bads). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.69 (crowded bads risky).

results.idea: Market-neutral earnings yield spread
results.description: Long high earnings yield and short low earnings yield normalized cross-sectionally (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild). SUGGESTION1 used that field. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.61 (earnings yield useful).

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme specific return kurtosis
results.description: Short names with extreme ts_kurtosis in daily_specific_return expecting reversion. SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.58 (statistical but noisy).

results.idea: Momentum minus residual volatility filter
results.description: Take momentum only when residual volatility is below median to reduce tail risk. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol with trade_when. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence: 0.72 (filtering reduces drawdowns).

results.idea: Sector rotation: long homebuilding vs short construction_machinery
results.description: Exploit relative strength between homebuilding_exposure_score and construction_machinery_exposure_score. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; construction_machinery had zero userCount but allowed in DATA. SUGGESTION4 prioritized available coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND 2 fields. Confidence: 0.52 (data sparsity for some fields increases risk).

results.idea: Short-interest crossover: long when short interest drops quickly
results.description: Long names where ts_delta(short_interest_factor_score,5) is strongly negative (short covering). SUGGESTION1 used short_interest_factor_score. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.67 (short-covering rallies common).

results.idea: Earnings quality x profit filter
results.description: Long profitable companies with strong earnings quality by multiplying profit and earnings quality loadings. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.68 (quality+profit durable).

results.idea: Market cap decile momentum
results.description: Apply momentum within market-cap deciles by scaling or doing cross-sectional zscore after grouping by size (here use current_market_cap_usd as filter with ts_zscore). SUGGESTION1 used market cap and momentum. KEEP_IN_MIND: group operator not used because GROUP fields not available; used divide normalization instead. Confidence: 0.66 (size stratification improves factor efficacy).

results.idea: Short volatile short-interest names
results.description: Short names with high short_interest_factor_score and high recent short-interest volatility (ts_std_dev), indicating unstable short-base. SUGGESTION1 used short_interest_factor_score (only one field allowed by KEEP_IN_MIND), so applied ts_zscore of short interest. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.62 (volatile short interest risky).

results.idea: Value plus low srisk: favor cheap low-specific-risk names
results.description: Long names with high value loading and low rsk70_mfm2_usfast_srisk. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. KEEP_IN_MIND complied. Confidence: 0.7 (value with low idiosyncratic risk durable).

results.idea: Short interest x momentum divergence fade
results.description: Short names where short interest rises but momentum is positive (contradiction), expecting unwind. SUGGESTION1 used short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.66 (contradiction signals reversal).

results.idea: Prospect seasonality momentum filter
results.description: Take prospect momentum only during favorable season (multiply prospect momentum by season loading). SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_season. KEEP_IN_MIND okay. Confidence: 0.62 (seasonality aids timing).

results.idea: Short sigma-of-specific returns (ts_std_dev)
results.description: Short names with high ts_std_dev(daily_specific_return,20) indicating unstable idiosyncratic returns. SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.59 (unstable names risk).

results.idea: Hedge-fund ownership percent momentum
results.description: Trade in the direction of increasing hedge_fund_ownership_percent (momentum/flow capture). SUGGESTION1 used hedge_fund_ownership_percent. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.64 (flows predictive short-term).

results.idea: Value/earnings-yield combo
results.description: Combine value loading with earnings yield to favor fundamentally cheap names. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.69 (classic combo strong).

results.idea: Residual volatility spike short
results.description: Short names where rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol spikes recently (ts_delta positive zscore). SUGGESTION1 used resvol. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.6 (risk spikes precede poor returns).

results.description: Isolate industry-specific prospect returns by subtracting market loading from prospect specret daily. SUGGESTION1 used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence: 0.63 (isolated industry signals valuable).

results.idea: Short high hedge-fund percent in small caps
results.description: Short names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent is high and market cap small (crowded microcaps). SUGGESTION1 used hedge_fund_ownership_percent and current_market_cap_usd. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.7 (crowded small caps vulnerable).

results.idea: Momentum decay filter using hump (turnover control)
results.description: Apply hump to momentum signal to reduce turnover while keeping signal direction. SUGGESTION1 used ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum,21) and hump operator to reduce turnover (operator allowed). KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied (operators <=7). Confidence: 0.68 (reduces transaction cost leakage).

results.idea: Short-term reversal flagged by days_from_last_change on specret
results.description: Short names where specret daily recently changed (low days_from_last_change) and extremely positive returns → revert. SUGGESTION1 used daily_specific_return and days_from_last_change operator with daily_specific_return. KEEP_IN_MIND complied (single field usage). Confidence: 0.6 (recent abrupt moves often reverse).

results.idea: Value momentum with hedge-fund avoidance
results.description: Long names with high value and low hedge_fund_ownership_percent to avoid crowded value. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.71 (uncrowded value tends to outperform).
